_comment: CTCAE6 Configuration - Pattern: External Namespace Dependency
_comment_pattern: This configuration demonstrates Pattern 2: External Namespace Dependency. CTCAE6 reuses NCIt Thesaurus properties (ncit:NHC0, ncit:P108) for consistency across NCI terminologies, while also defining local properties (P90, P97, P383, etc.) in its own ctcae6.owl namespace.
_comment_prefix_usage: Properties from NCIt Thesaurus use 'ncit:' prefix. Properties defined in ctcae6.owl have NO prefix. All prefixes must be declared in sparqlPrefix below.
description: Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events
_comment_code: External property from NCIt Thesaurus - standard concept code property
_comment_preferredName: External property from NCIt Thesaurus - standard preferred name property
_comment_synonym: Local properties from ctcae6.owl - NO prefix because they are defined in this ontology
_comment_synonymTermType: Local property - qualifier for synonym term type
_comment_synonymSource: Local property - qualifier for synonym source
_comment_definition: Local properties from ctcae6.owl - NO prefix
_comment_definitionSource: Local property - qualifier for definition source
_comment_mapping: All mapping properties are local to ctcae6.owl - NO prefixes
_comment_sparqlPrefix: Declares three namespaces: ':' and 'base:' for local ctcae6.owl properties, 'ncit:' for NCIt Thesaurus properties. This makes 'ncit:NHC0' and 'ncit:P108' valid in SPARQL queries.
